name: v2_course_sessions
schema: CREATE TABLE `v2_course_sessions` (`course` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `end_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `instructor` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `location` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `location_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `max_attendees` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `meeting_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `recording_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `start_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `timezone` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `title` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
